Package socialmedia

Class Post

java.lang.Object
socialmedia.Post
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommentPost, EndorsedPost
public class Post
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Used to handle all Post related operations. Used as an attribute of the Account class
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Post

      public Post()
      Default empty constructor of Post

    • Post

      public Post​(java.lang.String handle, java.lang.String message) throws HandleNotRecognisedException, InvalidPostException
      Used to construct a new Post given its handle and message
      Parameters:
      handle - handle of the author of the Post
      message - Post's message
      Throws:
      HandleNotRecognisedException - if Account with given handle does not exist
      InvalidPostException - if Post message is not in appropriate form

  • Method Details

    • generatePostID

      public int generatePostID​(Account authorOfPost)
      Used to generate a numerical identifier (ID) based on ID of author of the Post and Post chronology of the author
      Parameters:
      authorOfPost - author of the Post
      Returns:
      generated int numerical identifier (ID)

    • findPost

      public static Post findPost​(int id) throws PostIDNotRecognisedException
      Used to find a Post given its ID
      Parameters:
      id - ID to search for
      Returns:
      Post with given ID
      Throws:
      PostIDNotRecognisedException - if Post with given ID does not exist

    • findPost

      public static Post findPost​(Account authorOfPost, int id) throws PostIDNotRecognisedException
      Used to find a Post given its author and ID
      Parameters:
      authorOfPost - author of the Post to search for
      id - id to search for
      Returns:
      Post with given author and ID
      Throws:
      PostIDNotRecognisedException - if Post with given author / ID does not exist

    • removePost

      public void removePost()
      Used to remove the Post from the system. Before removing a post all of its endorsements are removed and comment replies are set as empty

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      String representation of the Post
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      formatted String representation of the Post

    • showPost

      public java.lang.String showPost​(Account author, java.lang.String tab)
      Used to show the Post given its author and tab value
      Parameters:
      author - author of the Post to show
      tab - used by showPostChildren, default value: empty string
      Returns:
      formatted String representation of the Post

    • showPostChildren

      public java.lang.StringBuilder showPostChildren​(Account author, java.lang.String tab) throws PostIDNotRecognisedException
      Used to show the Post all its Children given its author and tab value
      Parameters:
      author - author of the Post to show
      tab - tab position of the current Post in StringBuilder
      Returns:
      formatted StringBuilder representation of a Post and all its Children
      Throws:
      PostIDNotRecognisedException - used when finding the author of Children Posts (not thrown unless there is an error)
